DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate educational program Atrial Fibrillation patient Warfarin treatment regard patient ' knowledge Warfarin , related life distress quality life .
DOC.brief_title: The Educational Effectiveness Atrial Fibrillation Patients Under Warfarin Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: This parallel-group randomized control study . Four measurement ( ) knowledge Warfarin ; ( b ) life distress cause Warfarin treatment ; ( c ) quality life primary secondary endpoint . All participant participate face-to-face interview pretest 6-month follow-up outpatient department ( OPD ) . Each subject experimental group teach face-to-face individually accord investigator 's brochure OPD researcher train standardized protocol . The control group receive brochure .
